TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlXmlReader extends System.Xaml.XamlReader implements class System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo
Public Class XamlXmlReader Inherits XamlReader Implements IXamlLineInfo
public ref class XamlXmlReader : System::Xaml::XamlReader, System::Xaml::IXamlLineInfo
type XamlXmlReader = class inherit XamlReader interface IXamlLineInfo

summary.span: 使用 中介处理 XML 文件中的 XAML 标记，并生成 XAML 节点流。

span.span: Processes XAML markup from XML files by using an intermediary, and produces a XAML node stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造时 ， 需要。When you construct a , an is required. 此设计的目的是使用已建立的 XML 处理 .NET Framework Api 来处理流输入、从文件获取流等。The purpose of this design is to use established .NET Framework APIs for XML processing in order to handle stream input, to obtain a stream from a file, and so on. 是 XAML 操作的标准加载路径的第一个组件，并包含在中，并包含在 加载 xaml 的多个现有框架 XAML 实现中。 is the first component of the standard load path for XAML operations and is incorporated by as well as by several existing framework XAML implementations for loading XAML.

span.span: Understanding XAML Node Streams

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定行信息是否可用。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether line information is available.

value.span: 如果行信息可用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if line information is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是实现的一部分 。This property is part of the implementation. 结果部分基于用于初始化此的读取器设置 。The result is partially based on the reader settings that were used to initialize this .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property IsEof As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsEof { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值报告 XAML 节点流中的读取器位置是否位于文件结尾。

span.span: Gets a value that reports whether the reader position in the XAML node stream is at end-of-file.

value.span: 如果位置在节点流的概念上的文件末尾，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the position is at the conceptual end-of-file in the node stream; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前正在使用子树读取器，则在 退出子树的边界之后，子树读取器会报告。If you are currently using a subtree reader, the subtree reader reports after exiting the bounds of the subtree. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LineNumber As Integer
public: property int LineNumber { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取要报告的行号。

span.span: Gets the line number to report.
The line number to report.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是实现的一部分 。This property is part of the implementation. 、、或的节点类型 可以返回行号。Node types of , , , or can return a line number. 其他节点类型返回值0。Other node types return a value of 0. 如果为，则所有节点类型都将返回 0 `false` 。All node types return 0 if is `false`.

Understanding XAML Node Streams

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Namespace As NamespaceDeclaration
public: virtual property System::Xaml::NamespaceDeclaration ^ Namespace { System::Xaml::NamespaceDeclaration ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从当前节点中获取 XAML 命名空间。

span.span: Gets the XAML namespace from the current node.

value.span: 如果可用，则为当前节点中的 XAML 命名空间；否则为 。

span.span: The XAML namespace from the current node, if it is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前位置的为，则此属性仅具有非 null 结果 。This property only has a non-null result if the of the current position is . 此属性不会报告应用于一般范围意义的对象或成员的 XAML 命名空间。This property does not report the XAML namespace that applies to objects or members in a general scoping sense. 如果需要执行特定操作，则实现应缓存 XAML 命名空间信息。Your implementation should cache XAML namespace information if you need it for specific operations. 对于涉及加载的 XAML 架构上下文的默认操作，操作 XAML 命名空间由 XAML 编写器实现在内部缓存。For default operations that involve the loaded XAML schema context, the acting XAML namespace is internally cached by XAML writer implementations.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property NodeType As XamlNodeType
public: virtual property System::Xaml::XamlNodeType NodeType { System::Xaml::XamlNodeType get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前节点的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the current node.
A value of the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Read() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read () As Boolean

summary.span: 提供所加载的源中的下一个 XAML 节点（如果 XAML 节点可用）。

span.span: Provides the next XAML node from the loaded source, if a XAML node is available.

returns.span: 如果某节点可用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a node is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的节点 `false` 也返回 `true` 。A node where returns `false` also returns `true` for . 调用 通常具有前进或的副作用 。Calling generally has the side effect of advancing the or . 调用并获得结果后的下一个操作 `true` 通常是检查 。The next operation after calling and getting a `true` result is typically to check . 若要详细了解 XAML 节点流概念，请参阅[了解 XAML 节点流结构和概念](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/understanding-xaml-node-stream-structures-and-concepts)。For more information about XAML node stream concepts, see [Understanding XAML Node Stream Structures and Concepts](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/understanding-xaml-node-stream-structures-and-concepts).

related.span: 了解 XAML 节点流结构和概念

span.span: Understanding XAML Node Stream Structures and Concepts

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SchemaContext As XamlSchemaContext
public: virtual property System::Xaml::XamlSchemaContext ^ SchemaContext { System::Xaml::XamlSchemaContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象提供信息集的架构信息。

span.span: Gets an object that provides schema information for the information set.

value.span: 一个对象，该对象提供信息集的架构信息。

span.span: An object that provides schema information for the information set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值为默认 XAML 架构上下文或作为构造函数信息提供的专门派生的 XAML 架构上下文。This value is either the default XAML schema context or a specifically derived XAML schema context that is provided as constructor information. 架构上下文会影响 XAML 处理行为的许多方面。Schema context affects many aspects of XAML processing behavior. 特别 是，读取器通常由任何关联的编写器使用。In particular, the of the reader is generally used by any associated writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前位置的为，则此属性仅具有非 null 结果 。This property only has a non-null result if the of the current position is .

Understanding XAML Node Streams
